summary: When your health, magicka, or stamina get low enough, this script will use your potions for you.  No more deaths because you were too slow to hit the Inventory key!
descriptionHtml:
When your health, magicka, or stamina get low enough, this script will use your potions for you.  How low exactly can be configured, but here are the defaults:

[b]Health:[/b] 20 HP or 15% of Max HP
[b]Magicka[/b]: 0 MP or 4% of Max MP
[b]Stamina:[/b] 0 Stamina or 0% of Max Stamina

Now you can get rid of those excess potions you\'ve been compulsively saving up, and never again die because you were too slow to hit the inventory button!

In addition, if you prefer a more hands-on approach, you can use potions on your own using these hotkeys:

Numpad 1 - Health
Numpad 2 - Magicka
Numpad 3 - Stamina


[u]-Changelog-[/u]
1.1 - now includes Ultimate Potions.  Added settings for potion use delay to .ini.  Added hotkeys for using potions.

[u]-Additional Info-[/u]
You can set which potions (Minor, Plentiful, etc) you\'d like to use by editing the .ini.  It\'s well commented, so it should be straightforward to figure out.

[u]-Requirements-[/u]
Requires Script Dragon, found here: http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon

[u]-Installation-[/u]
1. Install Script Dragon from the above link.
2. Place autoPotion.asi and autoPotion.ini into the skyrim/asi folder. Not the Data folder.

[u]-Uninstalling-[/u]
Delete autoPotion.asi and autoPotion.ini.

[u]-Credit-[/u]
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon
author: Eldiran
